originalText.text:
A MUST GO place in New York City.  I went to see women basketballs games here as well my first concert, LINKIN PARK.  I went with my brother and we were so amazed by it all.  So much floors and fun to see our favorite band in such an iconic arena.  If something is hosted their, make sure you go, especially if you get great tickets at a good price.  It is pricey for tickets though, so make it count what you spend your money on.

Eat.Shop.Play.
Live Life Unscripted...

originalText.text: The World's Most Famous Arena lacks a good quality team to play in it. The suites are so high up along with the nosebleed seats that I wonder why any company would pay a premium for a suite with a much worse view than what the tv cameras show. The stadium ushers are the most obnoxious and push people I've ever met in my life, and from what I've read, the owner James Dolan seems to pass this on to them. The Knicks are famous for having overpriced, underachieving teams and the Rangers' playoff history isn't much better. Hopefully, the Brad Richards signing will work out for the Rangers, but the Knicks are still a few years away from being championship-caliber. I've been here for many concerts in my lifetime (U2, Buffet, Springstein et. al.) and the atmosphere is pretty nice and the sound's pretty good, though somewhat affected by a rock concert being held in an arena built for basketball & hockey. But for what they charge for Knicks & Rangers tickets, it's not worth it. Hopefully, the renovation will improve things.

originalText.text: What can one say about the World's Greatest Arena? As a fan of the NJ Devils I must admit there is no better place than MSG. After its latest transformation the Garden will be one of the best venues for sporting events.

text.text: What can one say about the World's Greatest Arena? As a fan of the NJ Devils I must admit there is no better place than MSG. After its latest transformation the Garden will be one of the best venues for sporting events.

originalText.text: One of the greatest attractions for sports fans. I frequent Knicks games and sit either courtside or baseline great seats to see all of the high flying action. Or in Walt Clyde Frazier words the dishing and swishing of the Knicks.

text.text: One of the greatest attractions for sports fans. I frequent Knicks games and sit either courtside or baseline great seats to see all of the high flying action. Or in Walt Clyde Frazier words the dishing and swishing of the Knicks.

originalText.text: Was in one of the sky boxes for a Knicks game. This is a legendary arena because of the history it holds and how it feels to be in the space. If you have a chance to go, do it.

text.text: Was in one of the sky boxes for a Knicks game. This is a legendary arena because of the history it holds and how it feels to be in the space. If you have a chance to go, do it.
